mention.text: supporters , at least in public , of the gun control -- really , prohibition -- movement
the black supporters of gun prohibition
Roger B. Taney , the racist chief justice who wrote the infamous Dred Scott decision of 1857
the executor of the estate that owned Scott
his equally racist pronouncements denying black people , whether slave or free , specific constitutional protections enjoyed by whites
citizens in any one state of the union , the right
the Civil War when black slaves were freed
a freeman 's right to obtain and maintain the implements of self-defense
this change in the status of the black man
the country -LRB- North and South -RRB- to agitate for restrictions on guns -- ignoring long established customs
The 14th and 15th Amendments to the Constitution
